Detailed Description

Feature consumer implmentation storing the heaviest feature only.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool iipr::CHeaviestFeatureConsumer::AddFeature ( const IFeature *  featurePtr,
bool *  isFullPtr = NULL 
) [virtual]

Add new feature to the set of features.

Parameters:
featurePtr instance of feature object. Please note, that the container takes controll over this object, so you cannot destroy this object manually. It cannot be NULL.
isFullPtr If it isn't NULL this paramster is used to get info whether the added feature satisfy search constraints and no additionally features should be added
Returns:
true if the pushed feature is valid for this container and was inserted correctly.

Implements iipr::IFeaturesConsumer.
